greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients for the nonnegative powers of rho(11) = 2*cos(Pi/11) when written in the power basis of the degree 5 number field Q(rho(11)). Coefficients for the zeroth and fourth powers.
comment: The formula for rho(11)^n, with rho(11) = 2*cos(Pi/11) (the length ratio (smallest diagonal)/side in the regular 11-gon) written in the power basis of the number field  Q(rho(11)) is: rho(11)^n = a(n)*1 - A231183(n)*rho(11) - A231184(n-2)* rho(11)^2 + A231185(n-3)*rho(11)^3 + a(n+1)*rho(11)^4, n >= 0.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,4,-3,-3,1).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 05 2013
